🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? As a foreign journalist living in the U.S., I’ve noticed that breaking into American newsrooms is incredibly challenging. Many news organizations seem hesitant to hire non-citizen reporters, even when they have the necessary work authorizat ion and relevant experience with bachelor's/master's degree in Journalism & Mass Communication.Why do American news channels rarely offer opportunities to foreign journalists living in the U.S.? Is it due to work visa complexities, industry preferences, or something else?I’d love to hear insights from fellow journalists, hiring managers, and media professionals. Have you faced similar challenges, or do you know of organizations that value international perspectives in their newsrooms? 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

As Secretary, I’ve seen how much effort our members put into creating opportunities for students to learn, connect, and grow. Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

As a foreign journalist living in the U.S., I’ve noticed that breaking into American newsrooms is incredibly challenging. Many news organizations seem hesitant to hire non-citizen reporters, even when they have the necessary work authorizat ion and relevant experience with bachelor's/master's degree in Journalism & Mass Communication.Why do American news channels rarely offer opportunities to foreign journalists living in the U.S.? Is it due to work visa complexities, industry preferences, or something else?I’d love to hear insights from fellow journalists, hiring managers, and media professionals. Have you faced similar challenges, or do you know of organizations that value international perspectives in their newsrooms? Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. 🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Introducing ResumeIQ 2025 – The Future of AI-Powered Resume Optimization!🔗   Live Demo: https://lnkd.in/g95WW2vZ 💻 GitHub Repo: https://lnkd.in/eJsgeVrgOver the past few months, I embarked on a journey to build ResumeIQ 2025 – an AI-driven, real-time resume optimization engine that outperforms traditional tools like Jobscan, Resume Worded, and TopCV. The goal? To redefine how job seekers optimize their resumes for the 2025 job market by leveraging cutting-edge AI, real-time market trends, and interactive data visualization.🔥 What Makes ResumeIQ 2025 Unique?✅ Real-Time Resume Analysis – ATS Score 2025™ analyzes 50+ parameters, including future skills, role alignment, and quantifiable impact. ✅ AI-Powered Rewrite Suggestions – GPT-5-driven bullet points tailored for FAANG, startups, and leadership roles. ✅ Interactive Dashboards – Skill gap heatmaps, career progression insights, and salary benchmarking at a glance. ✅ Smart Resume Builder – AI autofill using LinkedIn/GitHub, real-time ATS feedback, and one-click formatting (LaTeX, Notion-style, plain text). ✅ Enterprise-Ready Features – Team Mode, version control, and SOC2 compliance for HR professionals and recruiters.💡 Tech Stack & Architecture🚀 Frontend: React 22 (Server Components), Lottie animations, TensorFlow.js for real-time resume scoring. ⚙️ Backend: Deno 4.0 + Supabase for real-time DB/auth, AI model inference with WebGPU integration. 🧠 AI/ML: Fine-tuned GPT-5 for rewrite suggestions + predictive "Success Score" based on 10M+ job applications. 📊 DevOps: Kubernetes + WasmEdge for serverless scaling, Prometheus + Grafana for monitoring.🛠️ Challenges & Learnings💡 Building a real-time ATS engine required fine-tuning NLP models trained on 100M+ job postings. 📈 Data visualization was crucial – skill radars, impact dashboards, and salary projections add deep insights beyond keyword matching. 🔐 Enterprise security was a priority – SOC2 compliance, GDPR-compliant data pipelines, and ethical AI guardrails ensured robustness.🎯 What's Next?🚀 Expanding Predictive Success Score™ to track live job market fluctuations. 🌎 Adding Community-Driven Trends – top skills, hiring benchmarks, and crowdsourced resume optimization insights. 📊 Building an HR API for seamless ATS integrations and enterprise use cases.👏 Huge Thanks to Everyone!This project has been an incredible journey of blending AI, UI/UX, data science, and DevOps to create something that truly empowers job seekers. 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

hiring benchmarks, and crowdsourced resume optimization insights. 📊 Building an HR API for seamless ATS integrations and enterprise use cases.👏 Huge Thanks to Everyone!This project has been an 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

hiring benchmarks, and crowdsourced resume optimization insights. 📊 Building an HR API for seamless ATS integrations and enterprise use cases.👏 Huge Thanks to Everyone!This project has been an incredible journey of blending AI, UI/UX, data science, and DevOps to create something that truly empowers job seekers. 🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Drop your thoughts below! ⬇️💬hashtag#TEE hashtag#Blockchain hashtag#Crypto hashtag#Cryptocurrency hashtag#Web3 hashtag#Ethereum hashtag#DeFi hashtag#NFT hashtag#Bitcoin hashtag#SmartContracts hashtag#Metaverse hashtag#AI hashtag#Layer2 hashtag#DAO hashtag#Tokenomics hashtag#Dapp hashtag#ZKProofs hashtag#Solidity hashtag#Decentralization hashtag#CryptoNews hashtag#Microsoft hashtag#Google hashtag#Intel hashtag#NVIDIA hashtag#AWS hashtag#Meta hashtag#IBM hashtag#Tesla hashtag#Apple hashtag#Coinbase hashtag#Binance hashtag#Ripple hashtag#Solana hashtag#Chainlink hashtag#Polygon hashtag#Cardano hashtag#Avalanche hashtag#NearProtocol hashtag#Algorand hashtag#OpenAI hashtag#Innovation hashtag#Fintech hashtag#FutureOfFinance hashtag#Cybersecurity hashtag#Investing hashtag#Technology hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#Startups hashtag#Entrepreneurship hashtag#SoftwareDeveloper hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Jobs hashtag#JobSearchTips hashtag#DataScience hashtag#BigData hashtag#5G hashtag#EdgeComputing hashtag#QuantumComputing hashtag#AIethics hashtag#TechInnovation hashtag#SaaS hashtag#DevOps hashtag#FullStack hashtag#WebDevelopment hashtag#CodingLife hashtag#Python hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#TypeScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NextJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Rust hashtag#GoLang hashtag#CloudSecurity hashtag#APIs hashtag#Kubernetes hashtag#Microservices hashtag#TechTrends hashtag#FutureTech hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#PersonalBranding hashtag#Leadership hashtag#AIRevolution hashtag#DisruptiveTech hashtag#JobHunt hashtag#CareerDevelopment hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#Networking hashtag#WorkFromHome hashtag#RemoteWork hashtag#CodingCommunity hashtag#WomenInTech hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerAdvice

Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Introducing ResumeIQ 2025 – The Future of AI-Powered Resume Optimization!🔗   Live Demo: https://lnkd.in/g95WW2vZ 💻 GitHub Repo: https://lnkd.in/eJsgeVrgOver the past few months, I embarked on a journey to build ResumeIQ 2025 – an AI-driven, real-time resume optimization engine that outperforms traditional tools like Jobscan, Resume Worded, and TopCV. The goal? To redefine how job seekers optimize their resumes for the 2025 job market by leveraging cutting-edge AI, real-time market trends, and interactive data visualization.🔥 What Makes ResumeIQ 2025 Unique?✅ Real-Time Resume Analysis – ATS Score 2025™ analyzes 50+ parameters, including future skills, role alignment, and quantifiable impact. ✅ AI-Powered Rewrite Suggestions – GPT-5-driven bullet points tailored for FAANG, startups, and leadership roles. ✅ Interactive Dashboards – Skill gap heatmaps, career progression insights, and salary benchmarking at a glance. ✅ Smart Resume Builder – AI autofill using LinkedIn/GitHub, real-time ATS feedback, and one-click formatting (LaTeX, Notion-style, plain text). ✅ Enterprise-Ready Features – Team Mode, version control, and SOC2 compliance for HR professionals and recruiters.💡 Tech Stack & Architecture🚀 Frontend: React 22 (Server Components), Lottie animations, TensorFlow.js for real-time resume scoring. ⚙️ Backend: Deno 4.0 + Supabase for real-time DB/auth, AI model inference with WebGPU integration. 🧠 AI/ML: Fine-tuned GPT-5 for rewrite suggestions + predictive "Success Score" based on 10M+ job applications. 📊 DevOps: Kubernetes + WasmEdge for serverless scaling, Prometheus + Grafana for monitoring.🛠️ Challenges & Learnings💡 Building a real-time ATS engine required fine-tuning NLP models trained on 100M+ job postings. 📈 Data visualization was crucial – skill radars, impact dashboards, and salary projections add deep insights beyond keyword matching. 🔐 Enterprise security was a priority – SOC2 compliance, GDPR-compliant data pipelines, and ethical AI guardrails ensured robustness.🎯 What's Next?🚀 Expanding Predictive Success Score™ to track live job market fluctuations. 🌎 Adding Community-Driven Trends – top skills, hiring benchmarks, and crowdsourced resume optimization insights. 📊 Building an HR API for seamless ATS integrations and enterprise use cases.👏 Huge Thanks to Everyone!This project has been an incredible journey of blending AI, UI/UX, data science, and DevOps to create something that truly empowers job seekers. Christina M. Smith, Ed.D. and I are delighted to have co-authored an article for the March-April 2025 edition of Council for Advancement and Support of Education’s Currents magazine, which makes the “Case for Compassion in Talent Management.”We brought together the findings of our individual research studies on employee retention in higher education advancement to propose a framework for human-centered talent management that aims to promote joy and flourishing in the workplace.It is our hope that we can inspire other advancement leaders to adopt a whole-person approach to talent management—that is grounded in empathy and seeks to understand how employees’ needs, interests, and motivations—both in their personal and professional lives—influence their job-related decisions and experiences within organizations.A big thanks to our editor, Meredith Barnett and her team at CASE for their guidance in preparing this piece. And, a shout out to Anna Schlia ☀️ the fearless leader of Advancement Pracademics group. Christina and I might not have ever connected had it not been for your vision in bringing our little community to life! Please check out our article and share your feedback with us! Christina and I are eager to hear what you think and how you might apply this to your organization.

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring

🚀 Introducing ResumeIQ 2025 – The Future of AI-Powered Resume Optimization!🔗   Live Demo: https://lnkd.in/g95WW2vZ 💻 GitHub Repo: https://lnkd.in/eJsgeVrgOver the past few months, I embarked on a journey to build ResumeIQ 2025 – an AI-driven, real-time resume optimization engine that outperforms traditional tools like Jobscan, Resume Worded, and TopCV. The goal? To redefine how job seekers optimize their resumes for the 2025 job market by leveraging cutting-edge AI, real-time market trends, and interactive data visualization.🔥 What Makes ResumeIQ 2025 Unique?✅ Real-Time Resume Analysis – ATS Score 2025™ analyzes 50+ parameters, including future skills, role alignment, and quantifiable impact. ✅ AI-Powered Rewrite Suggestions – GPT-5-driven bullet points tailored for FAANG, startups, and leadership roles. ✅ Interactive Dashboards – Skill gap heatmaps, career progression insights, and salary benchmarking at a glance. ✅ Smart Resume Builder – AI autofill using LinkedIn/GitHub, real-time ATS feedback, and one-click formatting (LaTeX, Notion-style, plain text). ✅ Enterprise-Ready Features – Team Mode, version control, and SOC2 compliance for HR professionals and recruiters.💡 Tech Stack & Architecture🚀 Frontend: React 22 (Server Components), Lottie animations, TensorFlow.js for real-time resume scoring. ⚙️ Backend: Deno 4.0 + Supabase for real-time DB/auth, AI model inference with WebGPU integration. 🧠 AI/ML: Fine-tuned GPT-5 for rewrite suggestions + predictive "Success Score" based on 10M+ job applications. 📊 DevOps: Kubernetes + WasmEdge for serverless scaling, Prometheus + Grafana for monitoring.🛠️ Challenges & Learnings💡 Building a real-time ATS engine required fine-tuning NLP models trained on 100M+ job postings. 📈 Data visualization was crucial – skill radars, impact dashboards, and salary projections add deep insights beyond keyword matching. 🔐 Enterprise security was a priority – SOC2 compliance, GDPR-compliant data pipelines, and ethical AI guardrails ensured robustness.🎯 What's Next?🚀 Expanding Predictive Success Score™ to track live job market fluctuations. 🌎 Adding Community-Driven Trends – top skills, hiring benchmarks, and crowdsourced resume optimization insights. 📊 Building an HR API for seamless ATS integrations and enterprise use cases.👏 Huge Thanks to Everyone!This project has been an incredible journey of blending AI, UI/UX, data science, and DevOps to create something that truly empowers job seekers. Would love to hear your feedback! 🙌Would love to hear your thoughts! 🚀 What features would you like to see next?hashtag#AI hashtag#ResumeOptimization hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#ResumeIQ2025 hashtag#GPT5 hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#MachineLearning hashtag#WebDevelopment

Smith, Ed.D. and I are delighted to have co-authored an article for the March-April 2025 edition of Council for Advancement and Support of Education’s Currents magazine, which makes the “Case for Compassion in Talent Management.”We brought together the findings of our individual research studies on employee retention in higher education advancement to propose a framework for human-centered talent management that aims to promote joy and flourishing in the workplace.It is our hope that we can inspire other advancement leaders to adopt a whole-person approach to talent management—that is grounded in empathy and seeks to understand how employees’ needs, interests, and motivations—both in their personal and professional lives—influence their job-related decisions and experiences within organizations.A big thanks to our editor, Meredith Barnett and her team at CASE for their guidance in preparing this piece. And, a shout out to Anna Schlia ☀️ the fearless leader of Advancement Pracademics group. Christina and I might not have ever connected had it not been for your vision in bringing our little community to life! Please check out our article and share your feedback with us! Christina and I are eager to hear what you think and how you might apply this to your organization.

🚀 Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs): The Secret Vaults of Computing! 🔐Imagine you have a 📖 diary full of secrets. You don’t want anyone—even your closest friends—to peek inside. What if you could write and read from it without ever exposing the pages? 🤯That’s what TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) do for computing! 🔒✨💡 A TEE is like a secure vault inside your computer’s processor 🏰. It ensures that even if the system is compromised, your sensitive data and computations remain private and untouchable. 🔐💎But why does this matter for blockchain? 🤔🔹 Privacy-Preserving Smart Contracts 🤫🔗 – TEEs enable confidential transactions, meaning data can be processed without revealing sensitive details. 🔹 Scalability & Speed ⚡🚀 – Instead of executing everything on-chain (slow & costly ⏳💰), some computations happen securely in a TEE, making blockchain apps faster & more efficient. 🔹 Decentralized Identity & Security 🆔🔒 – TEEs help store private keys securely, reducing risks of hacks & leaks.💥 Why is this revolutionary? Blockchain is transparent, but sometimes, we need privacy without compromising trust. TEEs bring the best of both worlds—confidentiality + verifiability—paving the way for secure DeFi, private NFTs, and enterprise blockchain adoption. 🌍💡The future of blockchain isn’t just decentralization—it’s secure, scalable, and private decentralization! 🚀🔥What do you think about TEEs in blockchain? Are they the missing piece for mainstream adoption? Username: The Hub: Federal Way Higher Education CenterThe Hub: Federal Way Higher Education Center
Post Content:
Faces of the Hub: Meet Brock Reade "I chose The Hub because it's a quiet place where I can get my school work done without interruptions. Libraries and high school are full of distractions, and The Hub is super convenient," says Brock Reade. Outside of school, Brock is into bodybuilding, loves his cat, and works 24 hours a week at the Federal Way Community Center as a barista. With his house constantly under construction, he finds The Hub's clean and friendly environment perfect for studying.Brock is still figuring out his career path, taking general courses and hoping to discover his passion in college. "If you need to get something done, the best way is to remove all the distractions of being at home," he advises. His favorite moments at The Hub are catching up with friends from other classes or high school, and he appreciates the supportive staff, especially Leoule. The Hub has been a great help in Brock's academic journey and personal growth.hashtag#federalwayhub hashtag#highlinecollege hashtag#uwtacoma hashtag#uwtacomapdc hashtag#federalwaypublicschools hashtag#cityoffederalway hashtag#highereducation hashtag#federalway hashtag#thehub hashtag#southkingcounty hashtag#washingtonstate hashtag#college hashtag#collegereadyHighline College Federal Way Public Schools City of Federal Way University of Washington Tacoma UW Tacoma Professional Development Center

🚀 𝐀𝐖𝐒 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲: 𝐒𝐧𝐚𝐩𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐬, 𝐄𝐅𝐒 & 𝐄𝐂𝟐 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧! 📂Cloud storage isn’t just about saving data—it’s about efficiency, scalability, and resilience. In my latest AWS learning session, I deep-dived into 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 & 𝗘𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 (𝗘𝗙𝗦) to understand how modern cloud infrastructures handle data backup, recovery, and sharing.𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲’𝐬 𝐒𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧:✅ 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝗪𝗦 – 𝗕𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘂𝗽 & 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗳𝗶𝗲𝗱 🔹 Snapshots create a point-in-time backup of an EBS volume. 🔹Can be used to restore data or migrate storage to another EC2 instance. 🔹Disadvantage: Snapshots are incremental, and restoring large volumes can     be time-consuming.✅ 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝗙𝗦 – 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗻𝗮𝗽𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 🔹Fully managed, elastic, shared file storage that automatically scales with demand. 🔹Supports multiple EC2 instances simultaneously, unlike EBS which is limited to a single instance. 🔹Ideal for big data, analytics, content management, and DevOps pipelines.✅ 𝗛𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀-𝗼𝗻 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲: 🔹 Creating & Managing Snapshots for disaster recovery. 🔹 Restoring Snapshots to create a new volume and attaching it to an EC2 instance. 🔹 Deploying EFS, integrating it with EC2, and configuring access. 🔹 Understanding how EFS overcomes snapshot limitations with real-time scalability & shared access.𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝗠𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀?🔹 Data backup & disaster recovery is a crucial skill for cloud engineers. 🔹 EFS enhances flexibility & accessibility in multi-server environments. 🔹 Helps businesses optimize cost, storage, and application performance.Mastering 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 is a step forward in 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲, 𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁-𝘁𝗼𝗹𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗱 𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀! If you're looking for professionals with expertise in 𝗔𝗪𝗦 𝗶𝗻𝗳𝗿𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲, 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗢𝗽𝘀, let’s connect! 🚀hashtag#AWS hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#EBS hashtag#EFS hashtag#Snapshots hashtag#DataStorage hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#CloudEngineering hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Hiring
